name: 1800Hotels
tag_list: hotels, online-hotel-deals, discounted-hotel, discounted-hotels, hotel-discounts, hotel-deals, hotels-in-new-york, hotels-in-paris, hotels-in-london, hotels-in-las-vegas, bed-and-breakfast, inns, motels
overview:
1800Hotels.com is a website dedicated to finding you the best online deals on hotels. Through our extensive relationships with hotel suppliers and chains, we find both last-minute deals and inventory sold at rock-bottom prices in hotels all over the world. Whether you’re looking to stay in major destinations and need New York hotels, Las Vegas hotels, or a budget hotel in Orlando, 1800Hotels.com is your one-stop shop for the best deals online.

1800Hotels.com was established in 2002 and quickly became a major player in the world of online travel. As of January 2011, the domain 1800hotels.com is owned by Travel Leaders Group – a leading travel organization and one of the top ten travel companies in the United States – through its technology arm, Travel Leaders Technology, LLC. The website was re-launched in 2011 to offer value conscious consumers discounted hotel rooms. By combining inventory from a large number of wholesalers as well as directly negotiating rates with hotels, we provide you with the best value possible at the most properties worldwide.

Travel Leaders Technology, LLC and Travel Leaders Group are neither affiliated with nor connected to the previous owners of 1800hotels.com and 1800hotels.com before 2011. The website 1800hotels.ie is not a part of Travel Leaders Group.
